next_actions: Run the serious-practice interaction stress tests (ridge/shrinkage fits plus alternative anxiety codings) to decide whether it stays inside the `religiosity_class_gradients` confirmatory family.
Extend the H4 confirmatory shell to include the ordinal anxiety outcome so reviewers can audit two outcome codings before the next PAP freeze.
Translate the H3 design-effect mitigation scenarios into a concrete data acquisition plan (new respondents/countries) since naive wave pooling remains <0.3 power.
